event: renal cyst approximately 13 cm in size
endotracheal intubation with 8.0 mm ID tube
cyst ruptured at 50th minute of operation
cyst content diffused to retroperitoneal area
operation continued for 40 minutes after rupture
blood gas analysis taken 18 minutes after extubation
retroperitoneal fluid transition through diaphragmatic pores
referred to urology department 4 days after surgery
chest tube removed twelve days later
